details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: WCAG 2.1 validation profile
details.description: Extra rules for WCAG 2.1 validation in addition to PDF/UA-1

rule.description: If text has a different style, it shall be tagged as Span
rule.test: hasSpecialStyle == false

error.message: Text has a different style and not tagged as Span

rule.description: The structure type and attributes of a paragraph shall be semantically appropriate.
rule.test: correctType == 'P' && correctSemanticScore >= 0.75

rule.description: The structure type and attributes of a span shall be semantically appropriate.
rule.test: correctType == 'Span' && correctSemanticScore >= 0.75

rule.description: The structure type and attributes of a table shall be semantically appropriate.
rule.test: (correctType == 'Table' && correctSemanticScore >= 0.75) || correctType == 'TD' || correctType == 'TH' || correctType == 'TBody' || correctType == 'THead' || correctType == 'TFoot' || correctType == 'TR' || correctType == 'L' || correctType == 'LI' || correctType == 'Lbl' || correctType == 'LBody'

rule.description: The structure type and attributes of a heading shall be semantically appropriate.
rule.test: correctType == 'H' && correctSemanticScore >= 0.75

rule.description: The structure type and attributes of a numbered heading shall be semantically appropriate.
rule.test: correctType == 'Hn' && correctSemanticScore >= 0.75

rule.description: The structure type and attributes of a table row shall be semantically appropriate.
rule.test: (correctType == 'TR' && correctSemanticScore >= 0.75) || correctType == 'TD' || correctType == 'TH' || correctType == 'TBody' || correctType == 'THead' || correctType == 'TFoot' || correctType == 'Table' || correctType == 'L' || correctType == 'LI' || correctType == 'Lbl' || correctType == 'LBody'

rule.description: The structure type and attributes of a table header cell shall be semantically appropriate.
rule.test: (correctType == 'TH' && correctSemanticScore >= 0.75) || correctType == 'TD' || correctType == 'TR' || correctType == 'TBody' || correctType == 'THead' || correctType == 'TFoot' || correctType == 'Table' || correctType == 'LI' || correctType == 'Lbl' || correctType == 'LBody' || correctType == 'L' || correctType == 'LI' || correctType == 'Lbl' || correctType == 'LBody' || correctType == null

rule.description: The structure type and attributes of a table cell shall be semantically appropriate.
rule.test: (correctType == 'TD' && correctSemanticScore >= 0.75) || correctType == 'TR' || correctType == 'TH' || correctType == 'TBody' || correctType == 'THead' || correctType == 'TFoot' || correctType == 'Table' || correctType == 'L' || correctType == 'LI' || correctType == 'Lbl' || correctType == 'LBody' || correctType == null

rule.description: The structure type and attributes of table elements shall be semantically appropriate.
rule.test: (correctSemanticScore >= 0.75 && standardType == correctType) || (correctType != 'TD' && correctType != 'TR' && correctType != 'TH' && correctType != 'TBody' && correctType != 'THead' && correctType != 'TFoot') || (standardType == 'L' || standardType == 'LI' || standardType == 'Lbl' || standardType == 'LBody') || (isTableChild == true && isTableElem == false)

rule.description: Non-standard structure type shall not be used
rule.test: false

rule.description: The structure type and attributes of a caption shall be semantically appropriate.
rule.test: correctType == 'Caption' && correctSemanticScore >= 0.75

rule.description: The structure type and attributes of a caption shall be semantically appropriate.
rule.test: standardType == 'Caption' || correctType != 'Caption'

rule.description: The structure type and attributes of list elements shall be semantically appropriate.
rule.test: (correctSemanticScore >= 0.75 && standardType == correctType) || (correctType != 'L' && correctType != 'LI' && correctType != 'Lbl' && correctType != 'LBody') || (standardType == 'LBody' && correctType == 'LI') || (isListChild == true && isListElem == false)

rule.description: The structure type and attributes of a list shall be semantically appropriate.
rule.test: (correctType == 'L' && correctSemanticScore >= 0.75) || correctType == 'LI' || correctType == 'Lbl' || correctType == 'LBody' || correctType == 'TR' || correctType == 'TD' || correctType == 'TH' || correctType == 'TBody' || correctType == 'THead' || correctType == 'TFoot' || correctType == 'Table'

rule.description: The structure type and attributes of a list item shall be semantically appropriate.
rule.test: (correctType == 'LI' && correctSemanticScore >= 0.75) || correctType == 'L' || correctType == 'Lbl' || correctType == 'LBody' || correctType == 'TR' || correctType == 'TD' || correctType == 'TH' || correctType == 'TBody' || correctType == 'THead' || correctType == 'TFoot' || correctType == 'Table'

rule.description: The structure type and attributes of a list label shall be semantically appropriate.
rule.test: (correctType == 'Lbl' && correctSemanticScore >= 0.75) || correctType == 'L' || correctType == 'LI' || correctType == 'LBody' || correctType == 'TR' || correctType == 'TD' || correctType == 'TH' || correctType == 'TBody' || correctType == 'THead' || correctType == 'TFoot' || correctType == 'Table'

rule.description: The structure type and attributes of a list body shall be semantically appropriate.
rule.test: (correctType == 'LBody' && correctSemanticScore >= 0.75) || correctType == 'L' || correctType == 'LI' || correctType == 'Lbl' || correctType == 'TR' || correctType == 'TD' || correctType == 'TH' || correctType == 'TBody' || correctType == 'THead' || correctType == 'TFoot' || correctType == 'Table'

rule.description: A table element is incorrectly tagged as a list element or a list has the wrong numbering
rule.test: (correctType != 'TD' && correctType != 'TR' && correctType != 'TH' && correctType != 'TBody' && correctType != 'THead' && correctType != 'TFoot' && correctType != 'Table') || (standardType != 'L' && standardType != 'LI' && standardType != 'Lbl' && standardType != 'LBody')

rule.description: List item does not contain a label
rule.test: correctType != 'LI'
